name: LoudounSchools
0:
”Alexa, ask Loudoun Schools to check what day today is.”
”Alexa, ask Loudoun Schools to check what day tomorrow is”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: loudoun schools
des:
Ask Alexa if it is an A day or B day based on the LCPS school calendar. 
https://www.lcps.org/cms/lib/VA01000195/Centricity/Domain/31393/AB%20Calendar%202022_2023.pdf
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
